content: the squishy shroom uses a small amount of bulky chenille yarn in two colors and a size 7 4 5mm hook it is about 4 inches wide and 3 5 inches tall a great stash buster and it can also be made into a keychain - perfect for market prep thank you so much for creating your own squishy shroom from my pattern i hope you enjoy it and i d love to see your creations please tag me @231design on instagram so i can see your creations this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy share translate or distribute this pattern this pattern is copyright emily johnson of 231design if you are an independent crafter you may sell your creations as long as you give credit to 231design as the designer
